testproblem.name: Testing of particle based multimaterial fields in parallel for a small resolution prescribed vortex flow case. Vortex flow stretches particles from an initial circle of distinct compoisiton into a spiral, then reverses and reforms the initial circle. Conservation diagnostics are tested against those from a successful run.
